content:
cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #322

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 116

Submitted by @kensaku-kawamoto on behalf of @euvitudo from University of Utah

Chapter: Action
Section: https://cds-hooks.org/specification/1.0/
Type: NEG :exclamation:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

For delete, this is the id of any resource to remove from the current activity

Proposed Wording:

For delete, this is the id of any resource to remove

Comment:
As stated, implies that the EHR must know what is and is not part of current activity

## :de: Köln May 2018 Working Group Vote

@kpshek moved the following disposition, seconded by @jmandel.

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
Change per comment's proposed wording

:+1: For: 19
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

Resolved and merged as part of @bvdh 's PR #358 . Closing.
